game.name: Poke ALL Toads
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A puzzle game starring mischievous fairies. Complete levels by working as a team, operating dangerous machinery and manipulating local wildlife.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A puzzle game starring mischievous fairies. Complete levels by working as a team, operating dangerous machinery and manipulating local wildlife.
